mapper.select: select a.memberseq, title, content, readcount, wdate, addressfirst, addresssecond, center, mdate, mtime, back, chest, shoulder, arm, abs, leg, run, nickname, profile from bbs a, mate b, member c where a.bbsseq=b.bbsseq and a.memberseq=c.memberseq and a.bbsseq=#{bbsseq}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(memberseq, title, content, bbstag) values(#{memberseq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{bbstag})
